text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa rea di sraththa tx xallxhˌ læw læa di sraththa tx sing thi thuk prathan kæ rea læa sing thi thuk pra than kæ xi brxhim læa xis ma xil læa xis hak læa yaxˌ kub læa brrda phu sub cheuxsay (cak yaxˌ kub) læa sraththa tx sing thi mu sa læa xi sa læa na bi thanghlay di rab cak phracea khxng phwk khea doythi rea ca mi yæk rahwang khn hnung khn dı nı hmu phwk khea læa phwk rea nan pen phu thi nxbnxm tx phraxngkh
